variableDataArray.name: semi.Rsrh
variableDataArray.formula:
# semi.N:
# semi.P:
# semi.ni_mod: Modified intrinsic carrier concentration for mass action law = semi.ni_eff*sqrt(semi.gamma_n*semi.gamma_p)
# semi.taup: Hole lifetime, SRH
# semi.taun: Electron lifetime, SRH
# semi.n1: Modified electron concentration
# semi.p1: Modified hole concentration




( semi.N * semi.P - semi.ni_mod^2) / (semi.taup * (semi.N + semi.n1) + semi.taun*(semi.P + semi.p1))

variableDataArray.name: semi.n1
variableDataArray.formula:
# semi.ni_eff: Effective intrinsic carrier concentration
# semi.Delta_Et: Energy difference between the defect level and the intrinsic level


semi.gamma_n * semi.ni_eff * exp(semi.Delta_Et / semi.Vth)

variableDataArray.name: semi.p1
variableDataArray.formula:
# semi.ni_eff: Effective intrinsic carrier concentration
# semi.Delta_Et: Energy difference between the defect level and the intrinsic level

semi.gamma_p * semi.ni_eff * exp(-semi.Delta_Et / semi.Vth)

variableDataArray.name: semi.Delta_Et
variableDataArray.meaning: Energy difference between the defect level and the intrinsic level
